guide_description: Learn how to use the app and play fair.
guide_howto_footprint_steps: From the main menu, tap the 'See Your Carbon Footprint' button and complete the daily survey.
Get your analysis and your base points, which are added to your total immediately.
Tap the 'Go to Verification Center' button on the results screen.
Submit live photo proof of your activities (e.g., bus ride, vegetarian meal).
If your action is verified, your base points will be multiplied by 3x!
guide_howto_footprint_title: How to Use the Carbon Survey:
guide_howto_recycle_steps: From the main menu, tap the 'Scan Product Packaging' button.
Use your camera to scan the item's packaging. Our AI will identify the material.
Tap the 'Verify Disposal' button. This will open your camera again.
Take a clear photo of yourself (or your hand) placing the item into a recycling bin.
Our AI will verify your action. Points are awarded instantly on successful verification!
guide_howto_verification_steps: Navigate to the Verification Center from the survey results or the settings menu.
Choose the category you want to verify (e.g., Transport, Meal, Drink, Energy).
For Meal and Drink, you can submit a receipt OR a live photo of the item.
For Transport and other actions, a live photo of the action is required.
For monthly energy, capture your electricity or water bill.
Tap 'Capture & Submit' to take a live photo. Gallery uploads are disabled to ensure fairness.
guide_howto_verification_title: How to Use the Verification Center:
guide_points_disclaimer: Disclaimer: Point values for recycling and survey actions are illustrative and may be adjusted over time based on new environmental data or sponsor requirements.
guide_recycling_description: Earn points by scanning an item and verifying your disposal with a photo. Points are awarded based on the environmental impact of the material.
guide_survey_description: Complete a daily survey to get points. Verify with a receipt for a massive bonus!
guide_survey_footer: The system calculates a 'base point' value from your survey which is awarded immediately. Verifying with a receipt multiplies this base value.
guide_survey_items_list: High Footprint Penalty: If your footprint is over the regional max, you lose between -1 to -10 points, depending on the severity.
Base Reward: You get the full base points for your score immediately (e.g., a good score might get you +30 points).
Receipt Verification Bonus: Verifying with a receipt gives you a 3x bonus on your base points (e.g., 10 base points becomes +30!).
Second Chance Bonus: Reverse a penalty and earn the points you lost + 10 bonus points by taking a verified sustainable action.
guide_verification_description: To keep the community fair and rewards meaningful, all point-earning actions require verification. Attempts to manipulate the system will result in point penalties.
guide_verification_footer: Our AI moderation system verifies each submission. Penalties are applied automatically.
guide_verification_items_list: Live Photos Only: All verifications must be live photos taken through the app. Gallery uploads and screenshots are disabled.
Recycling: A photo of you (or your hand) placing the scanned item in the correct bin.
Carbon Actions: A photo of your sustainable action (e.g., your bus ticket, your bike, your home-cooked meal).
Duplicate Photo Penalty: Submitting the same photo multiple times will result in a -50 point penalty.
Fraud Penalty: Submitting clearly fake or AI-generated images will result in a -200 point penalty and may lead to account suspension.
